content_data.title: Sign in to your account
content_data.subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
content_data.description: Access your Bakalr Boutique account to view orders, manage your profile, and enjoy a personalized shopping experience.

messages.error_locked: Account locked. Please try again later.

content_data.legal_text: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
content_data.subtext: View orders, manage your profile, and enjoy a personalized shopping experience.

content_data.title: Create your account
content_data.subtitle: Join Bakalr Boutique and discover premium beauty products.
content_data.description: Sign up for exclusive deals, order tracking, wishlists, and a personalized shopping experience.

form_labels.terms_acceptance: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
form_labels.newsletter: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive offers

messages.success: Account created! Please check your email to verify.
messages.error_email_exists: An account with this email already exists
messages.error_weak_password: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number

content_data.legal_text: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. We'll send you updates about your orders and occasional promotional emails.
content_data.subtext: Create your account to unlock all features and start your personalized shopping journey.

content_data.title: Reset your password
content_data.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
content_data.description: Forgot your password? No problem. Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset it.

messages.success: Check your email for a password reset link
messages.success_description: We've sent a password reset link to your email address. The link will expire in 1 hour.
messages.error_not_found: No account found with this email
messages.error_too_many: Too many requests. Please try again later.

content_data.title: Create new password
content_data.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
content_data.description: Choose a strong password that you haven't used before.

messages.success_description: Your password has been changed. You can now sign in with your new password.
messages.error_invalid_token: This reset link is invalid or has expired
messages.error_weak_password: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, and number
messages.error_same_password: New password cannot be the same as your old password

content_data.title: Verify your email
content_data.subtitle: We've sent a verification link to your email.
content_data.description: Please check your inbox and click the verification link to activate your account.

messages.success_description: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in to your account.
messages.pending_description: Please check your email and click the verification link.
messages.resent_description: We've sent a new verification email. Please check your inbox.
messages.error_invalid_token: This verification link is invalid or has expired
messages.error_already_verified: This email has already been verified
messages.error_too_many: Too many requests. Please try again later.

content_data.title: Two-factor authentication
content_data.subtitle: Enter the code from your authenticator app.
content_data.description: For your security, please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.

messages.error_expired: Code expired. Please enter the new code.
messages.error_too_many: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

content_data.title: Use a recovery code
content_data.subtitle: Enter one of your backup recovery codes.
content_data.description: Recovery codes can only be used once. After using this code, it will be invalidated.

messages.warning: You have limited recovery codes remaining. Consider generating new ones.
messages.error_invalid_code: Invalid recovery code. Please try again.
messages.error_used_code: This recovery code has already been used.
messages.error_no_codes: No recovery codes remaining. Please contact support.
